message: Let's start fair. I'll take the lion's share this time, but we can negotiate more evenly in the next rounds.
That's a very generous offer, Alice, but I'm feeling lucky today. How about we tip the scales a bit in the other direction?
Okay, let's try this again. I'm willing to give up more this time, but I need to see some compromise from you as well.
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me closer this round.  I'm confident we can close this out now - how about we split the difference from our previous offers?
